trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> interface provides methods that indicate whether a client is authorized to connect on the current channel, based on the client's network address and user identity.
trans-unit.target: A interface <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> fornece métodos que indicam se um cliente está autorizado a conectar-se ao canal atual, com base na identidade de usuário e no endereço de rede do cliente.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as conexões de entrada em um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são desserializadas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that identifies the network address of the client.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> que identifica o endereço de rede do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the network address of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booliano que indica se o endereço de rede do cliente está autorizado a conectar-se ao canal atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the network address of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o endereço de rede do cliente estiver autorizado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as conexões de entrada em um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são desserializadas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> that represents the user identity of the client.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> que representa a identidade do usuário do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user identity of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booliano que indica se a identidade do usuário do cliente está autorizada a conectar-se ao canal atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user identity of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a identidade do usuário do cliente estiver autorizada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface é passada para <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.

trans-unit.source: It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece um ponto único de autorização para todas as conexões de entrada em um <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Permite a autorização do chamador antes de quaisquer mensagens de entrada são desserializadas para minimizar a ameaça de segurança de fontes não confiáveis.
